metadata.title: CVE-2015-3026 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Icecast before 2.4.2, when a stream_auth handler is defined for URLauthentication, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and crash) via a request without login credentials, asdemonstrated by a request to "admin/killsource?mount=/test.ogg."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

icecast2 - 2.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: icecast2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-1').
